languages.text: Due to construction features Leman Russ Tank can't fire at targets closer than 4 cells.

traits.locale_text: Due to construction features Leman Russ Tank can't fire at targets closer than 4 cells.

languages.text: Due to its structural features, the Leman Russ battle tank has a minimal firing range of 8 cells.

languages.text: 由于结构原因，黎曼·鲁斯战斗坦克的最小射程为8格。
